title: Is it acceptable to use “much appreciated” as the closing for a letter or email? - Quora

response.answer_text: it depends what is the context of your email/letter…if you are writing a “thank you’’ letter for the services you have acquired then it is appropriate to write … if you have asked /requested for some work/job /service to be done , then you cannot write this …
Yes, you can. And here is another expression Your help and support are greatly appreciated.
